content.Name: Python Machine Learning
content.Author: Sebastian Raschka
content.Summary: Python Machine Learning provides a comprehensive guide to machine learning and deep learning with Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow 2.

Key Sections.Chapter 1 - 5: Introduction to machine learning with Python and its libraries.
Key Sections.Chapter 6 - 10: Deep learning with TensorFlow and Keras.
Key Sections.Chapter 11 - 15: Advanced techniques and best practices in machine learning.

Important Pages: Page 25-30: Introduction to Python for machine learning.
Page 150-155: Convolutional Neural Networks in TensorFlow.

content.Name: Deep Learning for Vision Systems
content.Author: Mohamed Elgendy
content.Summary: This book teaches the concepts and tools for building intelligent, scalable computer vision systems using deep learning.

Key Sections.Chapter 1 - 3: Overview of computer vision and deep learning.

Important Pages: Page 90-95: Optimizing deep learning models for vision.
Page 150-155: Case studies in computer vision systems.

content.Name: Learning OpenCV 4
content.Author: Adrian Kaehler
content.Summary: An introduction to computer vision using the OpenCV library, exploring its applications, and techniques.

content.Name: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow
content.Author: Aurélien Géron
content.Summary: This book provides practical techniques to build intelligent systems using Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow.

Key Sections.Chapter 1 - 2: Fundamentals of machine learning and Python.
Key Sections.Chapter 6 - 9: End-to-end project examples in machine learning.

Important Pages: Page 20-25: Introduction to Scikit-Learn and Keras.
Page 100-105: Building neural networks with TensorFlow.

content.Name: Computer Vision: Algorithms and Applications
content.Author: Richard Szeliski
content.Summary: This book gives a comprehensive overview of computer vision algorithms and applications, with a focus on practical solutions.

Key Sections.Chapter 1 - 3: Basic concepts in computer vision algorithms.
